mapper.sql: id, device_id, device_longitude, device_latitude, step, data_time, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select: select sum(step) from fictitious_device_info where data_time between #{start} and #{end} and device_id = #{did};
select device_longitude, device_latitude, data_time from fictitious_device_info where data_time between #{start} and #{end} and device_id = #{device_id} order by data_time
mapper.insert: insert into fictitious_device_info (id, device_id, device_longitude, device_latitude, step, data_time, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{step,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into fictitious_device_info
id,
device_id,
device_longitude,
device_latitude,
step,
data_time,
create_time,
modify_time,

mapper.update:
update fictitious_device_info
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
device_longitude = #{deviceLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_latitude = #{deviceLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
step = #{step,jdbcType=BIGINT},
data_time = #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fictitious_device_info set device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, device_longitude = #{deviceLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_latitude = #{deviceLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step = #{step,jdbcType=BIGINT}, data_time = #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
